dict.string: FreshWall saves photos to your Camera Roll for backup and easy access outside the app.
FreshWall needs location access to capture GPS coordinates for incident reports. This helps accurately track where graffiti removal work is performed for client documentation.
FreshWall needs location access to capture GPS coordinates for incident reports. This helps accurately track where graffiti removal work is performed for client documentation.

FreshWall connects to Firebase development servers on your local network for testing and development purposes. This includes authentication (port 9099), database (port 8080), and cloud functions (port 5001).
